sourcesContent: import { Input  } from 'antd';import React, {useState, useCallback, useRef, useEffect} from 'react';const { Search } = Input;function MyInput() {    const [counter, setCounter] = useState("");    useEffect(function() {    }, [])        const useDebounce = function (fn: Function, delay: number, thisArg?: any) {        let timer: number;       return function (...args: any[]) {           if (timer) {               window.clearTimeout(timer);           };           timer = window.setTimeout(() => {                fn.apply(thisArg, args)           }, delay)       }    }        const onSearch = (e: Event) => {            const target = e.target as HTMLInputElement;            setCounter(target.value);            console.log(target.value);        }        return (            <>                {/*<Search*/}                {/*    placeholder="input search text"*/}                {/*    allowClear*/}                {/*    enterButton="Search"*/}                {/*    size="large"*/}                {/*    onSearch={useDebounce(onSearch, 1000)}*/}                {/*/>*/}                <input                placeholder="请输入测试数据"                onChange={useDebounce(onSearch, 1000)} />            </>        )}export default  MyInput;
